info.description: Retrieves currency pair position information for the legal entity
info.title: Holdings Treasury Currency Pairs APIs

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

parameters.name: positionType
parameters.description: The buy or sell position type of the transaction

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: Code used to identify the dealing desk responsible for monitoring and managing Foreign exchange positions

parameters.name: buyDate
parameters.description: The date of purchase

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: The date on which the deal was made.

parameters.name: positionPeriod
parameters.description: The period for which the position is displayed

parameters.name: counterpartyName
parameters.description: The name that is displayed for the counter party

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose
